channel.title: OC Transpo - Live Updates
channel.description: Daily route changes resulting from detours and cancelled trips are listed here by OC Transpo staff on weekdays, Saturdays until 9 pm and Sundays until 5 pm.

item.title: Carling Station: Elevator
item.description:
November 12 2018 -

Carling Elevator # 46:

The elevator at Carling Station is out of service for unforeseen maintenance. We regret any inconvenience this may cause. To access the O-Train platforms, customers are advised to board or de-board at either Bayview or Carleton Stations.

The elevator should be back in service by Wednesday, November 14.

For Travel Planning assistance, please call 613-741-4390 or press the free “Info” button on any Bell telephone in the station. For emergency assistance, use the nearest yellow emergency callbox.

item.title: 19 Parliament - Cancelled trip
item.description:
November 09 2018 -

The trip is cancelled between St Laurent station at 15:35 to Bank/Albert at 16:32. Next trip is 15 min later.

item.title: DETOUR: Campus Avenue Closure
item.description:
November 09 2018 -

Campus Avenue at Carleton University will be closed to buses from 7am on Tuesday, November 13, until 7pm on Wednesday, November 14, 2018. Routes 7, 10, 104 and 111 will be detoured during this period. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

Detour routing

  • Routes 7, 10, 104 and 111 into Carleton University will serve University Drive, Day Care Roadway, Raven Road and University Drive.

Affected stops

Bus stops (560#) NOT in use Alternate service
# 6612 -- Campus (west-side) and Residence Commons Temporary stop -- University Drive (west-side) and Campus
# 5813 -- Campus (west-side) and Library Temporary stop -- University Drive (west-side) and Daycare Road

item.title: 91 St Laurent: Cancelled Trip
item.description:
November 06 2018 -

The trip is cancelled between Trim Station at 7:19 and St. Laurent Station at 7:37. Next trip is 8 minutes later.

item.title: South Keys Station: Planned elevator outage
item.description:
November 04 2018 -

South Keys elevator # 39 (south platform):

The elevator at the south end of South Keys Station will be out of service from Tuesday, Nov. 13 at 7 am to Thursday, Nov. 15 at 7 am (approx.) for floor replacement work. We regret any inconvenience this may cause.

Customers requiring the use of an elevator to access the northbound platform are advised to: take any southbound bus at stop 1A to Transitway and Hunt Club, cross over to the northbound side and take any northbound bus at stop 8677 back to South Keys Station, or take Route 6 to the Bank Street side of the South Keys Shopping Centre.

For Travel Planning assistance, please call 613-741-4390 or press the free “Info” button on any Bell telephone in the station. For emergency assistance, use the nearest yellow emergency callbox.

item.title: DETOUR EXTENDED: River Road Closure (Rideau to Earl Armstrong)
item.description:
August 31 2018 -

From 9 am on Monday, September 10 until 6 pm on Saturday, December 15 2018, Route 299 will be detoured due to the River Road closure between Rideau and Earl Armstrong. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

Detour routing

  • Route 299 LeBreton will serve River, Rideau, Spratt, Earl Armstrong and Riverview Station
  • Route 299 Manotick will serve Riverview Park & Ride, Earl Armstrong, Spratt, Rideau and River

Affected stops

Bus stops (560#) NOT in use Alternate service
# 2121 -- River (east-side) and Nicholls Island # 0971 -- River (east-side) and Rideau
# 0976 -- River (east-side) and Nicholls Island
# 2123 -- 752 River (east-side) # 3040 -- Riverview Park & Ride
# 2011 -- 752 River (west-side)
# 0975 -- 806 River (west-side) # 0972 -- River (west-side) and Rideau
# 2122 -- River (west-side) and Nicholls Island

item.title: DETOUR: Queen Street Closure
item.description:
August 29 2018 -

From Sunday, September 2 2018 until further notice, Routes 6, 7, 12, 16, 18 and 19 will be detoured due to the Queen Street closure. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

Detour routing

  • Route 6 Downtown will serve Bank, Wellington and Rideau
  • Route 6 Greenboro will serve Rideau, Wellington and Bank
  • Route 7 St-Laurent will serve Bank, Wellington and Rideau
  • Route 7 Carleton University will serve Rideau, Wellington and Bank
  • Route 12 Rideau (only some trips) will serve Rideau, Elgin, Queen, O'Connor and Albert
  • Route 16 Britannia will serve Mackenzie King and Albert
  • Route 16 Main will serve Slater and Mackenzie King
  • Route 18 Parliament will serve Rideau, Wellington and O'Connor
  • Route 18 St-Laurent will serve Bank, Wellington and Rideau
  • Route 19 St-Laurent will serve Slater and Mackenzie King
  • Route 19 Mackenzie King will serve Mackenzie King and Albert

The Travel Planner will reflect the final routing that will be in place once Queen Street reopens.

Make sure you check the detour notes in your trip plans and schedules.

Affected stops

Bus stops (560#) NOT in use Routes Alternate service
# 7557 -- Elgin (east-side) and Wellington 6,7 # 3009 -- Rideau 3A (south-side) and Nicholas
# 1228 -- Queen (north-side) and Metcalfe 6, 7 # 7691 -- Wellington (north-side) and Metcalfe
16 # 3001 -- Albert (north-side) and Metcalfe
# 7558 -- Elgin (west-side) and Queen 6, 7 # 7691 -- Wellington (north-side) and Metcalfe
# 3052 -- Parliament Station B 6, 7 # 7692 -- Wellington (north-side) and O'Connor
16, 19 # 3002 -- Albert (north-side) and Bank
# 3052 -- Parliament Station A 6, 7, 18 # 7546 -- Bank (east-side) and Sparks
16 # 3007 -- Slater (south-side) and Bank
19 # 3008 -- Slater (south-side) and Metcalfe
12 # 3002 -- Albert and Bank
# 1368 -- Queen (south-side) and Kent 16 # 3006 -- Slater (south-side) and Kent
12 # 3002 -- Albert and Bank
# 7683 -- Queen (north-side) and Kent 16 # 3003 -- Albert (north-side) and Kent
# 1512 -- Queen (south-side) and Metcalfe 6, 7, 18 # 7694 -- Wellington (south-side) and Metcalfe
16 # 3008 -- Slater (south-side) and Metcalfe
# 3051 -- Lyon Station B 16 # 3006 -- Slater (south-side) and Kent
# 3051 -- Lyon Station A 16 # 3003 -- Albert (north-side) and Kent
# 7549 -- Bay (east-side) and Queen 16 # 3005 -- Slater (south-side) and Bay

Detour Maps

item.title: DETOUR: Seneca Closure (Sunnyside to Grove)
item.description:
June 22 2018 -

From 7:00 AM on Tuesday July 10th until 6:00 PM on Friday November 30th 2018, route 7 will be detoured due to the closure of Seneca Street between Sunnyside and Grove. Please allow a few extra minutes for your travel.

Detour Routing

  • Route 7 St-Laurent will serve Sunnyside, Leonard, Grove and Bank.

Affected Stops

Bus Stops (560#) NOT in use Alternate Service
# 6737 -- Seneca (west-side) and Glen

# 6683 -- Sunnyside and Seneca

# 6685 -- Grove and Leonard
# 6738 -- Grove (south-side) and Seneca
# 6685 -- Grove (south-side) and Leonard Temporary Stop at Grove (north-side) and Leonard

item.title: DETOUR: McBean Bridge (between Strachan and Royal York)
item.description:
June 13 2018 -

From Wednesday, June 20th 2018 until late fall 2018, routes 283 and 301 will be detoured due to construction work taking place on the McBean Bridge between Strachan Street and Royal York Street. Route 301 will be detoured on Mondays only.

Detour Routing

  • Route 283 Mackenzie King will serve King, Royal York, McBean, Ottawa, Eagleson, Perth, McBean, and Strachan
  • Route 283 Mackenzie King (trips from Munster and Flewellyn) will serve Eagleson, Ottawa, King, Royal York, McBean, Ottawa, Eagleson, Perth, McBean, and Strachan
  • Route 283 Richmond will serve McBean, Perth, Eagleson, Ottawa, McBean, Royal York, and King
  • Route 283 Richmond (trips to Munster and Flewellyn) will serve Strachan, McBean, Perth, Eagleson, Ottawa, McBean, Royal York, King, Ottawa, Eagleson, and Perth
  • Route 283 Richmond (trips to Stittsville from Richmond) will serve Strachan, McBean, Perth, Eagleson, Ottawa, McBean, Royal York, King, Ottawa, Eagleson, and Perth
  • Route 301 Carlingwood will serve King, Royal York, McBean, Ottawa, Eagleson, Perth, McBean, and Strachan
  • Route 301 Richmond will serve McBean, Perth, Eagleson, Ottawa, McBean, Royal York, and King

Affected Stops

Bus Stops (560#) NOT in use Alternate Service
# 6278 -- McBean (west-side) and Strachan Stop will be temporarily relocated approximately 50 m northwest to Strachan (south-side) and McBean
# 6281 -- McBean (west-side) and Royal York Stop will be temporarily relocated approximately 100 m northeast to Royal York (north-side) and McBean

Detour Maps

283 Mackenzie King

283 Mackenzie King (trips from Munster and Flewellyn)

283 Richmond

283 Richmond (trips to Munster and Flewellyn)

283 Richmond (trips to Stittsville from Richmond)

301 Carlingwood

301 Richmond

item.title: Elgin Street Construction
item.description:
March 08 2018 -

Routes 5 and 14 will continue their regular routes during Elgin Street construction beginning March 12, 2018. Construction may cause delays.
